attributes.action: chronic fatigue (ME) autoimmune and fibromyalgia should be automatically covered on tge disabilities act list. As they each are debilitating.
attributes.additional_details: Chronic Fatigue Syndrome (CFS/ME) has been described as worse and more debilitating than HIV, cancer and Multiple sclerosis by a leading physician Dr. Nancy Klimas. Fibromyalgia runs in parallel to Multiple sclerosis in terms of symptoms.  Illnesses that are on the protected list. Yet CFS/ME and Fibromyalgia are not. Nor are many autoimmune diseases.  This champagne is to change this. If you have or know someone who has any of these illnesses please help this champagne join the "we are not invisible champagne" and SIGN! !!
